casebody.data:
ANTONIO LINVAL-CASSIUS v. COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION (AC 21739)

Lavery, C. J., and Bishop and Hennessy, Js.

Argued January 8 officially released February 12, 2002 Per Curiam.

We affirm the judgment on the basis of General Statutes § 18-98d, Rivera v. Commissioner of Correction, 254 Conn. 214, 756 A.2d 1264 (2000), and Payton v. Albert, 209 Conn. 23, 547 A.2d 1 (1988).

The judgment is affirmed.
